title: Pogačar or Van der Poel? Milan-San Remo and the Chase for the Monument Sweep
content:
Pogačar faces Van der Poel and pavé-shaped problems in his quest to be first since De Vlaeminck to claim victories across all five monuments.

Read the full article at Pogačar or Van der Poel? Milan-San Remo and the Chase for the Monument Sweep on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
